meanings.definition: A tropical fruit with sweet, juicy flesh.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the delicious sweetsops for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The market sells fresh sweetsops every Saturday.
meanings.sent3: The sweetsops were so sweet, they made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a ripe sweetsops fruit.
meanings.sent5: The scent of ripe sweetsops filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The tree that bears the sweetsops fruit.
meanings.sent1: The sweetsops tree in our garden provides shade in summer.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new sweetsops tree in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel climbed the sweetsops tree looking for a snack.
meanings.sent4: The sweetsops tree stood tall, its branches reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the sweetsops tree rustled in the gentle breeze.
